localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

nodes.excerpt: A new way of making music by connecting musicians all over the world with a low-latency and high-quality audio network. No special hardware is needed, just a desktop computer with an internet connection.
nodes.title: Sublive - Low-latency jamming over the internet
nodes.author: Guy Malachi

nodes.excerpt: Clarity Trip is a personalized soundscape made for walking, running, and mindful physical activity. It adapts to your step count, heart rate, and environment and helps you move with complete mental and physical clarity. Co-created with R'n'B star Miguel.
nodes.title: Endel Clarity Trip - AI backed soundtrack that adapts to your every step
nodes.author: Philipp Karetov

nodes.excerpt: mixmello is a free, open source tool to create remixed versions of your favourite playlists. Search for the Spotify playlist you want to remix, tailor the remixes to your liking (with song previews), then save the playlist with a single click.
nodes.title: mixmello - Create remixed versions of your favourite Spotify playlists
nodes.author: Alex Gurr

nodes.excerpt: Avant.fm provides a customizable, listenable feed of new releases from the best indie record labels, across all genres. Works with your Spotify account.
nodes.title: avant.fm - Daily feed of new releases from the best indie record labels
nodes.author: chris marstall

nodes.excerpt: LALAL.AI is an online service for music source separation powered by AI technologies. Extract vocal, instrumental, and various musical instruments from any song or even video.
nodes.title: LALAL.AI for instruments - Worldâ€™s first 7-stem separation service for audio & video
nodes.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

nodes.excerpt: Stream playlists worry-free on your Twitch livestreams and VODs from Soundstripeâ€™s full music collection. Create, shuffle, and access exclusive playlists from lo-fi to EDM for $3.99/month or $36 annually (25% savings).
nodes.title: Twitch Pro from Soundstripe - Create takedown-safe playlists for Twitch streams and VODs
nodes.author: Trevor Hinesley

nodes.excerpt: Perform's AI-powered music workouts respond to real-time inputs like heart rate and pace to improve exercise. Trained on nearly 100k workouts and 1M song listens, Perform knows the right song for every moment of your workout to maximize results.
nodes.title: Perform - Your smart workout DJ
nodes.author: Eric Brownrout

nodes.excerpt: Have you ever wondered how strong your bond is with someone? Your music taste is the best way to tell if you're on the same wavelength or not. Try quizing your friends, family members, or significant other through music to find out who knows you the best!
nodes.title: Beatmatch - Quiz friends through music
nodes.author: Chudi Iregbulem

nodes.excerpt: Download the MajorGig app to discover, follow and tip your favorite performers. Check-in to local shows and share your experience using photos, videos, and venue ratings. We make it easy to support the performers you love wherever they are performing.
nodes.title: MajorGig - Put yourğŸ’²where your â¤ï¸ is
nodes.author: Tony Burrus

nodes.excerpt: Interact with a catalog of original animated illustrations to create your custom soundscape, mix nature sounds and lofi music or use our suite of productivity tools.
nodes.title: lofi.co - Music, art and tools to relax & focus
nodes.author: Orazio Antonaci

nodes.excerpt: See your Spotify stats, connect with 125k+ music fans, and discover new music. â € https://volt.fm/?ref=producthunt helps you experience Spotify in a totally new way.
nodes.title: volt.fm - Your Spotify profile on steroids
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: TuneRelease provides music promoters with shareable song pages, a contacts manager, email composer and in-depth analytics on engagement complete with exportable CSV reports.
nodes.title: TuneRelease - Empowering musicians to pitch their latest releases
nodes.author: Luke Rynne Cullen

nodes.excerpt: Fast Spotify client with native GUI, without Electron, built in Rust. Very early in development, lacking in features, stability, and general user experience. It is being tested only on Mac so far, but aims for full Windows and Linux support.
nodes.title: PSST - Fast and multi-platform Spotify client with native GUI
nodes.author: Seto El Kahfi

nodes.excerpt: Extract and isolate vocals from any Audio file/YouTube video using AI and Deep Learning. A website that allows you to choose music you want to isolate quickly and for free, and allows you to download the vocal and instrumental parts.
nodes.title: AudioStrip - Isolate vocals from any song from YouTube for free
nodes.author: Basil Woods

nodes.excerpt: - Imaginative song titles generated by AI - Audio, cover art, and other functionalities are intentionally omitted for others to create/interpret - Free to mint, just gas - 8K song titles Mint here: https://tunesproject.org
nodes.title: Tunes - Imaginative song titles generated by AI
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Royalty-free music from audio stocks never fit the content you're making, and often require additional editing. Mubert Render makes royalty-free music tracks of exact length, mood and genre with the help of AI. Fits your content like a glove!
nodes.title: Mubert Render - Soundtrack for your content made by AI
nodes.author: Tristan Pollock

nodes.excerpt: A collection of immersive universes where users appear as 3D avatars in free roam and interact via live voice. Universes are social communities curated by creative artists globally. Artists create, share, perform, and live broadcast to a global audience.
nodes.title: Multiverse - Immersive social environments supporting creative artists
nodes.author: Johannes Frank

nodes.excerpt: Introducing Frost 4.0: The Netflix of writing apps. Get your first draft going without any hassle. No bells and whistles. Just you and your writing. Available for free on all desktop/laptop browsers. ğŸ¦Œ Recommended browser: Chrome, Safari.
nodes.title: Frost 4.0 - Minimal mood-inducing writing app
nodes.author: Mansidak Singh

nodes.excerpt: Today I launch Focusli 2.0 ğŸš€ ------ Find the best music stream to study/relax ------ Choose from 30 stations ------ 5 Genres LOFI ğŸµ Classic ğŸ¹ Jazz ğŸ· Techno ğŸ›ï¸ Meditation ğŸ§˜ ------ I would appreciate your feedback ğŸ™

nodes.excerpt: Do you ever have an awesome idea for a killer playlist, like you definitely know you want it to start with some indie pop, and finish with some bop electro, and have some slow folk somewhere but can't figure out the rest? - Well, Tempo can!
nodes.title: Tempo: Playlists for Spotify - Sketch the vibe of your playlist
nodes.author: GÃ¶khan EÄŸri

nodes.excerpt: Find discovering new music hard? Jinx makes it easy It suggests songs based on what you are currently listening to, as well as your existing playlists in Apple Music. It also suggests daily curated playlists and includes a widget for quick access to your music
nodes.title: Jinx - Discover music just for your taste
nodes.author: Pawan Dixit

nodes.excerpt: See your most listened music on Spotify for both songs and artists. Also, create Spotify playlists from your most listened to songs.
nodes.title: Statiks - Spotify stats and playlist maker
nodes.author: Tanjum ğŸ”¥ ğŸš€ğŸš€

nodes.excerpt: Calliope represents the simplest way to create audio mixes and memos collections. A project allows recording and importing audio segments that can be trimmed and merged in a few taps.
nodes.title: Calliope - Record and edit audio clips
nodes.author: Sergio La Rosa

nodes.excerpt: Doppler is a music player for people who buy music. - Speed up organising your music - No need to convert files - Sync with iPhone app - Beautiful design - Powerful integrations Doppler makes owning music and supporting artists simple.
nodes.title: Doppler for Mac - A music player for people who buy music. Now on Mac.
nodes.author: Ed Wellbrook

nodes.title: Tunefork - Enjoy tailor made sound for your earprint

nodes.excerpt: Â· Ultralight at 4.7g Â· Powerful 11.6mm speaker driver Â· Sound by Teenage Engineering Â· Active Noise Cancellation Â· Up to 34 hours of listening Â· IPX4 rating Â· transparent veneers

nodes.excerpt: Muse allows you to build immersive 3D websites that act as virtual worlds. Websites no longer need to be static and boring. Transform boring links, e-commerce stores, and more into fun and immersive experiences today. Compatible on all devices with a browser.
nodes.title: Muse - Transform static websites into virtual worlds
nodes.author: Gustaf AlstrÃ¶mer

nodes.excerpt: Musixmatch is announcing a new service aimed to provide a self-service platform for all music creators and professionals to verify music credits, claim and administrate copyrights, distribute music, and get paid.
nodes.title: Musixmatch Pro - One place, for music creators
nodes.author: Murat Mutlu

nodes.excerpt: Music Widget is a remote app for Apple Music on macOS. It's a take on the original iTunes Widget introduced with Dashboard in Mac OS X 'Tiger' back in 2005. Music Widget looks extra sharp on retina displays because most of its interface is drawn in code.
nodes.title: Music Widget for Apple Music on macOS - A take on the classic iTunes Widget
nodes.author: Mario Guzman

nodes.excerpt: Celebrate Tyler, The Creator's latest album by creating your own matching Call Me If You Get Lost ID.
nodes.title: Call Me If You Get Lost ID Generator - Your ID for Tyler's Tunes
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: Add this short (31 second) song to streaming playlists. All the $ generated goes to reforesting the world. Every ~100 streams we plant a tree. It's the world's first MP-Tree Offset your streaming
nodes.title: This Song Plants Trees - Stream this 30 sec song. Every 100 plays we plant a tree
nodes.author: Matt Gordon

nodes.excerpt: Listen to you favorite tunes, on Apple Music or Spotify, with this web app that brings up the iPod nostalgia
nodes.title: iPod Classic - Classic iPod interface for Spotify or Apple music library
nodes.author: Pierre-Marie Galite

nodes.excerpt: Annie Music enables you share your favorite songs from all streaming platforms, within one link. Now your friends can enjoy your favorite songs without tons of google search to find the link. Just share with annie and voila!
nodes.title: Annie Music - The easiest way to share good music
nodes.author: David Adamu

nodes.excerpt: Spotify's latest app letting you host and participate in live discussions through virtual rooms. No Spotify account needed. Discussion can be recorded, there's chat, and speakers can earn gems.
nodes.title: Greenroom by Spotify - Talk music, sports and culture live
nodes.author: Gabe Perez

nodes.excerpt: HeadScroll is a product that helps musicians play instruments. It allows them to navigate their music sheets, chords, or tabs by simply tilting their head. The product is in beta, but we're looking forward to hear your early feedback! ğŸ˜Š
nodes.title: HeadScroll - Scroll music tabs with your head
nodes.author: Juan Herrera

nodes.excerpt: This is a tribute to the timeless legacy Daft Punk has contributed to this world. Enjoy the 24/7 radio of their tracks or live shows, or test your "fan level" by guessing the random track's name or even play tetris with faster & faster tracks as you level up!
nodes.title: Daft Punk Cafe - Fun place for all Daft Punk fans around the world
nodes.author: Alex MacCaw

nodes.excerpt: Playdate, app and game designer Panicâ€™s first shot at hardware will cost $179, ship next month, and come with a 24-game â€œseasonâ€ doled out over 12 weeks. But now it also has a cute speaker dock and low-code game creation platform ğŸ˜»
nodes.title: Playdate - Handheld video game set with speaker dock, low-code platform
nodes.author: Aditya

nodes.excerpt: Blend is a new way for two friends to merge their musical tastes into one curated playlist made just for them. Blend will be updated daily and will grow with each user over time based on how their listening changes.
nodes.title: Spotify Blend (Beta) - A new way for two friends to merge their musical tastes
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Luxurious yet leisurely. Frivolous yet sophisticated. The same sweet sound of summerâ€” turned up to 11. Pack your virtual bags as you've been upgraded from sitting poolside to a private cabana at The Poolsuite.
nodes.title: Poolsuiteâ„¢ - The super-summer music player
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: For the first time ever, startups and developers have direct access to stream popular music in apps â€“ in a simple, legal, cost-friendly way. Developers can integrate popular music into their prototypes for free with SDKs for iOS, JavaScript and Android.
nodes.title: Adaptr - Instantly license popular music for your app, try for free
nodes.author: bryn boughton

nodes.excerpt: Your currently playing track from Spotify & Apple Music, displayed right on your desktop. Super customizable with easy preferences to let you change everything about Sleeve, including size, style, position, layout, track info and more!
nodes.title: Sleeve - Your currently playing track displayed right on your desktop
nodes.author: Kasper Villum Jensen

nodes.excerpt: Meditation music for your videos, guided meditations, apps, and more. Commercial use allowed.
nodes.title: Meditation Music by ZENmix - Royalty free meditation music for commercial use
nodes.author: Jens Boje

nodes.excerpt: Features - 1. Download any music from Soundcloud. 2. Blazing fast downloads. 3. Absolutely free no hidden or upfront costs. 4. Ads free as well. 5. Unlimited music downloads allowed. 6. High quality music download. 7. Privacy protected downloads.
nodes.title: Soundcloud Music Downloader - Download songs using the soundcloud music downloader
nodes.author: Ayush Kumar Singh

nodes.excerpt: humit is the love child of Spotify and Reddit that let's you share the most powerful moments from your favorite songs to Subreddit-esque channels, which we refer to as 'Stations'
nodes.title: humit - The social music sharing and discovery app
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: GTA Radio as a form of virtual escapism, sit back choose your favorite game and station, and enjoy driving visuals from the game. A little dose of nostalgia for GTA fans, in what has become a bloated and stressful world!
nodes.title: GTA Radio - A musical dose of video game nostalgia
nodes.author: Sam Alexander

nodes.excerpt: This tool enables you to search for ANY musician and it approximates how much money generates on royalties on all the major streaming platforms such as Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon, and many others! Completely free!
nodes.title: Royalties Calculator - Know how much money any musician makes
nodes.author: Gabriel FerratÃ©

nodes.excerpt: The Sounds of Earth project aims to raise awareness for the protection and restoration of our ecosystems by reminding people of the uniqueness and natural beauties of this planet.
nodes.title: Sounds of Earth - Listen to relaxing ambient sounds of nature
nodes.author: Kevin William David

nodes.excerpt: Download thousands of free videos, images, and music tracks. We've handpicked some of the best work created by our global artist community so you can bring your vision to life. Create world-class content for your website, social media, and marketing campaigns.
nodes.title: Pond5 Free Collection - Thousands of high-quality videos, images, and music tracks
nodes.author: himi das

nodes.excerpt: Congrats, you got the Covid-19 vaccine. Now save the record for free with VaxYes. In 3 easy steps you can get a secure, digital vaccine record that you can use for Travel, Live Shows, and Employers. Get your free, secure, verified digital vaccine card.
nodes.title: VaxYes - Free, secure, verified, digital vaccine card
nodes.author: Mouyyad Abdulhadi

nodes.excerpt: Got your beat stolen? Beat Lock is a free tool for beatmakers and producers that allows you to discover who is using your beat in music streaming services. You can upload a file from your desktop or even import it from a BeatStars URL.
nodes.title: Beat Lock - Discover who is using your beat in music streaming services
nodes.author: Guillermo Perez

localize.description: è¢«å·æ‹äº†ï¼ŸBeat Lockæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå…è´¹çš„å·¥å…·ï¼Œä¸ºèŠ‚æ‹åˆ¶ä½œè€…å’Œåˆ¶ç‰‡äººï¼Œè®©ä½ å‘ç°è°åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨ä½ çš„èŠ‚æ‹åœ¨éŸ³ä¹æµæœåŠ¡ã€‚ä½ å¯ä»¥ä»ä½ çš„æ¡Œé¢ä¸Šä¼ æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œç”šè‡³ä»BeatStarsçš„URLå¯¼å…¥ã€‚

nodes.excerpt: Tune in to lofi.cafe to focus, work, study, or relax âœ¨ You'll find a curated selection of live lofi stations from YouTube, in a beautiful online player.
nodes.title: lofi.cafe - Relax & focus with live lofi stations ğŸ§
nodes.author: Fabrizio Rinaldi

nodes.excerpt: The smart player from Spotify that fills your car with music, news, entertainment, talk, and more.
nodes.title: Car Thing - The smart player from Spotify that fills your car with music
nodes.author: BjÃ¶rn Antonissen

nodes.excerpt: Meritocratic music platform where the best music gets exposure not the best marketed music. As you rank songs you impact the elo ratings of songs which impacts how many other users see them. We also learn what you like and generate you custom playlists!
nodes.title: LaunchSong - Rank songs to discover the best underground music
nodes.author: Jonah Livingston

nodes.excerpt: Hi Product Hunt! I'm Dmitriy, the maker of Noizer. I would love to introduce you to my small project - Noizer. An app, where you can listen to ambient sounds. It's inspired by Noisli project, but 100% free.
nodes.title: Noizer - Ambient sounds like Noisli, but free
nodes.author: Dmitriy Malakhov

nodes.excerpt: A simple web app to procedurally generate random MIDI melodies that you can use royalty free in your own work.
nodes.title: Melody Generator - Randomly generated MIDI melodies you can use for free
nodes.author: Chris McCormick

nodes.excerpt: Listen to music with friends while you work. Soundcloud and Youtube supported.
nodes.title: haminet.fm - Listen to music with your friends while working
nodes.author: Haminators

nodes.excerpt: Enter Vibe City and cruise through a regularly updated selection of chill music âœŒğŸ¼ -- Website: https://www.vibecity.fm
nodes.title: Vibe City FM - Non-stop & regularly updated selection of chill music
nodes.author: Max Nagtegaal

nodes.excerpt: Sonosâ€™s smartest and most versatile speaker sounds incredible for its size, is effortless to set up and control, and packs new innovation into a premium, lightweight, and durable design.
nodes.title: Sonos Roam - A portable, waterproof speaker from Sonos
nodes.author: Calum Webb

nodes.excerpt: Vinyls is a beautiful music player built with iOS design guidelines in mind. There are no complicated user accounts or settings to configure. You can start listening to your music right away. You can scrub to seek, watch the tone arm follow the playback time.
nodes.title: Vinyls - A beautiful music player for iOS
nodes.author: JPEGuin

nodes.excerpt: An extremely entertaining musical guessing game where you race against friends to name that tune! "The music round of a pub quiz on steroids". Great for livening up a group Zoom call. Also includes single player quizzes and custom quiz creator.
nodes.title: Songlio - Free musical guessing game: race friends to name that tune
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: https://PlaylistMap.com is the most direct and authentic way to reach new listeners, grow your fanbase, and increase streams and saves. PlaylistMap was built to make this easier.
nodes.title: PlaylistMap - Connect with Spotify playlist curators from around the world
nodes.author: Enrique Serrano Aparicio

nodes.excerpt: Hand Music is an easy to use music app which can be controlled by moving your palm to any block. Simply position your hand above a block to hear it play.
nodes.title: Hand Music - Make music with your hand gestures
nodes.author: rihab

nodes.excerpt: Do you miss working in an office? Listen to the sounds of the hit TV show The Office! Check out the product that went viral on reddit with 24K site visits in 2 days ğŸ”¥
nodes.title: Work at Dunder Mifflin - The Office TV show ambient sounds
nodes.author: Sharath Kuruganty

nodes.excerpt: Doppler is a beautifully designed music player designed and built for people who buy music. Import music and playlists to listen offline, and edit song and album artwork and info without syncing. Now with support for Siri, Spotlight Search, and CarPlay.
nodes.title: Doppler 2.3 - iOS music player for people who buy music
nodes.author: Ed Wellbrook

nodes.excerpt: An intuitive method without piano sheet music No more need to know anymore how to decipher piano sheet music or to know music theory. In a few seconds, you recognize the notes to be played on a keyboard. More than 1,000 songs from every genre and skill level
